item.description: The show will air over three weeks in September.

item.title: Todd and Julie Chrisley’s Podcast Is Back, Already (Exclusive)
item.description: ‘Chrisley Confessions 2.0’ will debut Wednesday, 49 days after the Chrisleys were released from prison via a President Trump pardon.
